Author: misternightingale
Text: I can’t tell what your boyfriend’s intentions could possibly be, but it’s nonetheless fucked up for him to publicly talk about something that he knows will make you feel uncomfortable/embarrassed.   There are people who legitimately think PUBLIC SHAMING is somehow an acceptable way to pressure their loved ones into “getting help” for ED. . . and honestly that kind of thinking is just so backwards and terrible. Making someone miserable or ashamed in a social setting, or ambushing them with other people on your side. . . does not help.
